name: Stat Surfer
description:
Made by me and @boople__snoot for #Trijam 103. Took 2 hours and 16 minutes to make.

Mouse to move in the flying section, no controls for the skating section.

My best score is 420.55m. I dare you to beat it. if you do and then you at some point, somehow, meet me in person i will print out a sticker which says "i am better at stat surfer than the developers" and give it to you
